name: NOZOMI NETWORKS [<%= eventname %>]
description: Nozomi Networks SCADAguardian rapidly detects cyber intrusions, cyber risks and process anomalies. Its up-to-the-minute insights improve cyber resiliency and reliability plus increase the efficiency of both OT and IT staff. This rule looks for low severity events listed in 'nozomi_alert_action'.

name: NOZOMI NETWORKS [<%= eventname %>]
description: Nozomi Networks SCADAguardian rapidly detects cyber intrusions, cyber risks and process anomalies. Its up-to-the-minute insights improve cyber resiliency and reliability plus increase the efficiency of both OT and IT staff. This rule looks for these critical severity events listed in 'nozomi_alert_action'.

query: class=nozomi ruleid:$nozomi_alert_action severity>5 severity<8 NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4
name: NOZOMI NETWORKS [<%= eventname %>]
description: Nozomi Networks SCADAguardian rapidly detects cyber intrusions, cyber risks and process anomalies. Its up-to-the-minute insights improve cyber resiliency and reliability plus increase the efficiency of both OT and IT staff. This rule looks for these medium severity events listed in 'nozomi_alert_action'.

query: class=nozomi ruleid:$nozomi_alert_action severity>7 severity<=9 NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4
name: NOZOMI NETWORKS [<%= eventname %>]
description: Nozomi Networks SCADAguardian rapidly detects cyber intrusions, cyber risks and process anomalies. Its up-to-the-minute insights improve cyber resiliency and reliability plus increase the efficiency of both OT and IT staff. This rule looks for these high severity events listed in 'nozomi_alert_action'.

name: NOZOMI NETWORKS [<%= eventname %>]
description: Nozomi Networks SCADAguardian rapidly detects cyber intrusions, cyber risks and process anomalies. Its up-to-the-minute insights improve cyber resiliency and reliability plus increase the efficiency of both OT and IT staff. This rule looks for these low severity events listed in 'nozomi_alert_medium'.

name: NOZOMI NETWORKS [<%= eventname %>]
description: Nozomi Networks SCADAguardian rapidly detects cyber intrusions, cyber risks and process anomalies. Its up-to-the-minute insights improve cyber resiliency and reliability plus increase the efficiency of both OT and IT staff. This rule looks for these high severity events listed in 'nozomi_alert_medium'.

query: class=nozomi ruleid:$nozomi_alert_medium severity>5 severity<=9 NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

description: Nozomi Networks SCADAguardian rapidly detects cyber intrusions, cyber risks and process anomalies. Its up-to-the-minute insights improve cyber resiliency and reliability plus increase the efficiency of both OT and IT staff. This rule looks for these medium severity events listed in 'nozomi_alert_medium'.

query: class=nozomi severity <= 5 NOT ruleid:`audit:*` NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4
name: NOZOMI NETWORKS [<%= eventname %>]
description: Nozomi Networks SCADAguardian rapidly detects cyber intrusions, cyber risks and process anomalies. Its up-to-the-minute insights improve cyber resiliency and reliability plus increase the efficiency of both OT and IT staff. This rule looks for these low severity events, as reported by Nozomi.

query: class=nozomi severity > 5 severity < 8 NOT ruleid:`audit:*` NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4
name: NOZOMI NETWORKS [<%= eventname %>]
description: Nozomi Networks SCADAguardian rapidly detects cyber intrusions, cyber risks and process anomalies. Its up-to-the-minute insights improve cyber resiliency and reliability plus increase the efficiency of both OT and IT staff. This rule looks for these medium severity events, as reported by Nozomi.

description: Nozomi Networks SCADAguardian rapidly detects cyber intrusions, cyber risks and process anomalies. Its up-to-the-minute insights improve cyber resiliency and reliability plus increase the efficiency of both OT and IT staff. This rule looks for these high severity events, as reported by Nozomi.

query: class=nozomi severity >= 10 NOT ruleid:`audit:*` NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4
